channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Xi'an Jiaotong University on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: MAPS: A Multi-Agent Framework Based on Big Seven Personality and Socratic Guidance for Multimodal Scientific Problem Solving
item.description: MAPS solves multimodal scientific problems better by combining multiple agents and Socratic learning.

item.title: MARS: A Multi-Agent Framework Incorporating Socratic Guidance for Automated Prompt Optimization
item.description: MARS: Optimizing prompts with multi-agent collaboration and Socratic learning for better LLM performance!

item.title: GKG-LLM: A Unified Framework for Generalized Knowledge Graph Construction
item.description: GKG-LLM: Unifying Knowledge Graph Construction with a novel 3-stage framework, empowering domain adaptation & resource efficiency.

item.title: PhysReason: A Comprehensive Benchmark towards Physics-Based Reasoning
item.description: PhysReason benchmark evaluates physics-based reasoning in LLMs, revealing critical limitations and guiding future improvements.

item.title: From Elements to Design: A Layered Approach for Automatic Graphic Design Composition
item.description: LaDeCo: a layered approach to automatic graphic design composition, generating high-quality designs by sequentially composing elements into semantic layers.

item.title: ChatGen: Automatic Text-to-Image Generation From FreeStyle Chatting
item.description: ChatGen-Evo automates text-to-image generation from freestyle chatting, simplifying the process and significantly improving performance over existing methods.
